title: 25 Exciting Things to Do With Your Boyfriend

steps.title: Pick a 2-player board game and enjoy a night of friendly competition.
steps.content: Pick a 2-player board game and enjoy a night of friendly competition. Many board games have a 2-player minimum, so you and your boyfriend have quite a few options to choose from! You could even try a game designed for couples, like question cards that help you get to know each other better. [1] X Research source Fun 2-player board games include Bananagrams , Ticket to Ride , The Couple’s Game , and Monopoly . If you and your boyfriend are both 21+, you could also try a drinking game. For example, you could play drunken Charades or Pictionary and take a drink when you guess incorrectly.

steps.title: Blanket forts can make your movie nights more playful and intimate.
steps.content: Blanket forts can make your movie nights more playful and intimate. Forget Netflix and Chill! Blanket forts are the way to go. Make a blanket fort in your living room or bedroom. Then, add pillows, string lights, and cozy blankets to create a sweet, romantic atmosphere. Stock up with enough movie theater snacks to share and marathon your favorite movies together.

steps.title: Save money on ordering out and see what you can cook as a couple.
steps.content: Save money on ordering out and see what you can cook as a couple. Show your boyfriend how to make your favorite recipe, make his favorite dish, or find a new dish that both of you can try. Put on some music in the background and set aside a couple of hours to spend some quality time in the kitchen together. [2] X Research source You could also whip up a tasty dessert together (or, if you’d rather focus on the main course, pick up dessert from the store beforehand).

steps.title: Pack some snacks, get in the car, and see where the road takes you!
steps.content: Pack some snacks, get in the car, and see where the road takes you! Take as many twists and turns as you like and pull over to look at interesting stops you find on your phone’s GPS as you embark on your road trip . Spend an entire day exploring in your car and find a hotel for the night, or make your way back home before it gets too late. Either way, it’ll feel nice to know you got away from home for a bit.

steps.title: What’s more sensual than a professional massage with your boyfriend?
steps.content: What’s more sensual than a professional massage with your boyfriend? Luxury spas often offer packages for couples who want to treat themselves to a day of pampering! Just search for spas in your area and find one that will let you book a full or partial body massage in the same room as your boyfriend. [3] X Research source If you prefer not to go out, you could also just give each other romantic massages instead and create your own little spa day at home.

steps.title: Hikes are the perfect activity if you and your boyfriend love being active.
steps.content: Hikes are the perfect activity if you and your boyfriend love being active. Want to work up a sweat and spend some time in the great outdoors? Give yourselves a challenge by taking a hike together. Find a local trail to visit, and pack plenty of water and snacks so you can take your time exploring and enjoying the sights along the trail.

steps.title: Plan a full-day visit to ride all your favorite roller coasters together.
steps.content: Plan a full-day visit to ride all your favorite roller coasters together. Do you live near an amusement park or carnival? Grab passes for you and your boyfriend and spend a day indulging in all the wild rides, arcade games, and delicious snacks the theme park has to offer.

steps.title: See how well you can work together to solve exciting puzzles.
steps.content: See how well you can work together to solve exciting puzzles. Do you and your boyfriend enjoy a challenge? Do you have fun solving puzzles? Then find an intriguing themed escape room and book a visit for both of you. When the time comes, you’ll be sealed into a room and must collaborate to come up with an escape strategy and find all the hidden clues. [4] X Research source

steps.title: Find a museum that interests both of you and spend an afternoon there.
steps.content: Find a museum that interests both of you and spend an afternoon there. What better way to spend a weekend day than at the museum? There are tons of different museums covering every subject, from astronomy to aquatic sea life. Look at each exhibit with your boyfriend and talk about all the different exhibits you come across. You could even buy mementos at the gift shop for one another! Some museums even have self-guided tours, where you can listen to a recorded commentary about each exhibit and explore in your own time.

steps.title: Turn produce shopping into an adventure by visiting a you-pick farm.
steps.content: Turn produce shopping into an adventure by visiting a you-pick farm. Spend the day picking fruit fresh off the trees and taking romantic photos of the beautiful scenery (and, of course, each other). Some you–pick farms have other attractions, too, depending on the time of year—like a bakery, restaurant, petting zoo, or hay ride.

steps.title: Make a scavenger hunt for your boyfriend and have him do the same.
steps.content: Make a scavenger hunt for your boyfriend and have him do the same. That way, you can surprise each other with a carefully devised, custom-made scavenger hunt! After careful planning, create some scavenger hunt clues and come up with a reward for your boyfriend to win. Then hide those clues in all of their locations and see how long it takes for them to find the final prize. Be sure to help each other if you or your boyfriend gets stuck on a clue. At the end of the day, you’re there to enjoy yourselves.

steps.title: Elevate your cooking skills by attending a class together.
steps.content: Elevate your cooking skills by attending a class together. Cooking classes can also be a great bonding activity for you and your boyfriend! Choose which food or cuisine you want to learn to make and book your class. Best of all, you get to put your new knowledge to the test at home with meals you can make together.

steps.title: Compete by playing a few couple-friendly multiplayer video games.
steps.content: Compete by playing a few couple-friendly multiplayer video games. Do you or your boyfriend love games? There are many ways to make video games a couples’ activity, from playing co-op (cooperative) games that require you to work together to competitive multiplayer games. Alternatively, you could play each other’s favorite single-player game and guide the other through it. [5] X Research source For example, you could play a co-op game like Overcooked or a competitive multiplayer game like Mario Kart together!

steps.title: Picnics are simple, romantic, and perfect for a leisurely day outdoors.
steps.content: Picnics are simple, romantic, and perfect for a leisurely day outdoors. Picnics are a classic date activity for good reason. They can be the perfect way to spend quality time together and experience the great outdoors without going too far from home. Pack some food that you’ll both enjoy and set up a cozy picnic spot at the local park. Spend an afternoon or evening eating and talking together!

steps.title: Belt out a love song together or sing an all-time favorite tune.
steps.content: Belt out a love song together or sing an all-time favorite tune. Head out to a karaoke bar with your boyfriend and plan out your perfect duet. It doesn’t matter if the two of you are natural musicians or totally tone-deaf; the goal is to have fun and sing your hearts out. You could also do a karaoke night at home. Even if you don’t have a machine, you could queue up the karaoke versions of a few songs on YouTube and sing them together.

steps.title: Swim, read, sunbathe, and spend a sunny day at the beach together.
steps.content: Swim, read, sunbathe, and spend a sunny day at the beach together. If you live near a beach, it might be the perfect time to make a trip with your boyfriend! Just pack some food, sunscreen, and your swimsuit. If you’re both the adventurous type, you could do a fun beach activity like paddle boarding or surfing. Otherwise, you can make a day out of just walking the sand and getting food from the boardwalk. If you can find a private spot or a less-crowded beach to relax on, bring a bottle of champagne for extra romance.

steps.title: Visit a local ice rink with your boyfriend during the winter months.
steps.content: Visit a local ice rink with your boyfriend during the winter months. Ice skating dates can be super romantic—and if you have an ice skating rink or frozen lake in your town, you and your boyfriend can experience the magic for yourselves. Buy or rent some skates, and hit the ice! Be sure to get some hot chocolate afterward, too. [6] X Research source If your town doesn’t have an ice skating rink to visit (or it’s just not winter), rollerblading is an equally fun alternative!

steps.title: Bowling is simple to learn and fun to play, whether you win or lose.
steps.content: Bowling is simple to learn and fun to play, whether you win or lose. Bowling is also an easy casual date idea for just about any couple! Head to the nearest bowling lanes and see which of you can score the most strikes —and who can win the game. [7] X Research source

steps.title: Learning each other's love languages can strengthen your relationship.
steps.content: Learning each other's love languages can strengthen your relationship. Did you know there are 5 different love languages that help define how you feel and experience love? Everyone has one or two primary love languages—so knowing yours will help your boyfriend express his love to you and vice versa. Take a love language quiz , and reveal your results to one another! [8] X Research source

steps.title: Start a lazy morning off right and surprise your boyfriend with breakfast.
steps.content: Start a lazy morning off right and surprise your boyfriend with breakfast. Your boyfriend will really appreciate the surprise, and you’ll get to enjoy a delicious meal together in bed. You could whip up some pancakes or make omelettes for both of you—whatever you feel like making at the moment! If you’re not in the mood to cook and live within the range of food delivery apps like Doordash or Postmates, you could also order breakfast for the two of you.

steps.title: Get out of the house and stay in a hotel if you’re both feeling restless.
steps.content: Get out of the house and stay in a hotel if you’re both feeling restless. Depending on your preferences and budget, you could kick back at a luxurious resort or find a quaint bed and breakfast. Similarly, you could have a 1-night getaway or spend a whole weekend with your boyfriend. Either way, seizing the moment and renting a hotel room can be a fun mini-vacation for both of you. You could also look for places to stay on platforms like Airbnb or Vrbo. You never know what cool rental options might come along!

steps.title: Search local wineries for tasting events and sample their best wines.
steps.content: Search local wineries for tasting events and sample their best wines. Wine tasting is fun, classy, and delicious if you and your boyfriend are regular wine drinkers. If either of you prefers beer to wine, you could find a local brewery instead—one that might even let you take a behind-the-scenes tour of the facility and let you sample a pint or two. [9] X Research source

steps.title: Test your boyfriend’s knowledge while competing against other teams.
steps.content: Test your boyfriend’s knowledge while competing against other teams. Plenty of local bars and pubs host trivia nights, where you and the other patrons split into teams and compete to see who can answer the most trivia questions correctly. Trivia nights can also be a fun way for you and your boyfriend to try out a new restaurant and meet some new friends (or trivia rivals.) If neither of you is in the mood to go out, you could also play a trivia game at home. Think up a whole list of trivia questions and take turns asking them to see how many you can each get right.

steps.title: Find your rhythm together and learn all kinds of couples’ dances.
steps.content: Find your rhythm together and learn all kinds of couples’ dances. Sign up for a dance class together—or, if you can spring for it, you could even get a private instructor for you and your boyfriend. You could learn a variety of exciting dances, from a sultry salsa to a romantic tango or classic ballroom dance and everything else in between. Not only is dancing a fun skill to pick up together, but you’ll learn to cooperate, work together, and be in tune with each other’s bodies.

steps.title: Make custom sundaes and sample one another’s ice cream creations.
steps.content: Make custom sundaes and sample one another’s ice cream creations. Who can make the most creative sundae: you or your boyfriend? Find out by setting out a bunch of different ingredients, from brownie bites to gummy worms and fresh fruit, and make your own sundaes together. You can enjoy your own creations or swap sundaes and see whose tastes best.
